overview.description: Generate insights with comprehensive reporting tools for cases, performance, and compliance
overview.whatItDoes: Create, customize, and schedule reports across all system data with export capabilities
overview.whyItMatters: Data-driven decisions require accurate, timely reports. Proper reporting ensures compliance, identifies bottlenecks, and enables strategic planning.
keyBenefits: Custom report builder for specific requirements
Export in multiple formats (PDF, Excel, CSV)

run-predefined-report.title: Run Pre-Defined Report
run-predefined-report.description: Generate standard reports from the report library
steps: Navigate to Reports from the sidebar
Browse report categories (Cases, Hearings, Tasks, Performance, Financial)
View results in browser or download
tips: Use quick date ranges (This Month, Last Quarter, YTD)
Apply filters before generating for faster results
reportTypes: Case Status Summary - Active cases by stage and priority
Hearing Calendar - Upcoming and past hearings
Task Completion - Tasks by status and assignee
Client Portfolio - Cases by client with financials
Team Productivity - Work distribution and completion rates

create-custom-report.title: Create Custom Report
create-custom-report.description: Build tailored reports with specific columns, filters, and groupings
steps: Go to Reports > Custom Reports tab
Select data source (Cases, Hearings, Tasks, Clients, etc.)
tips: Start with a pre-defined report and customize
Test with date ranges before saving
warnings: Complex reports with many columns may be slow
Large date ranges can timeout - use pagination

schedule-report.title: Schedule Automated Reports
schedule-report.description: Set up recurring report generation and email delivery
steps: Open a saved report (pre-defined or custom)
Set subject line and optional message
tips: Schedule reports for early morning delivery
Use PDF for stakeholders, Excel for analysts
Include date placeholders in subject lines
warnings: Scheduled reports use filters set at schedule time
Update schedule if filter criteria change

export-report.title: Export Report Data
export-report.description: Download report results in various formats
steps: For PDF: Choose page layout options
For Excel: Select which sheets to include

formats.pdf: Best for sharing, includes formatting and branding
formats.excel: Best for further analysis, includes raw data
formats.csv: Best for data integration, plain text format

dashboard-widgets.title: Add Dashboard Widgets
dashboard-widgets.description: Pin key metrics to your dashboard for quick visibility
steps: Generate a report with desired metrics
widgetTypes: KPI Card - Single number with trend indicator

compliance-reports.title: Generate Compliance Reports
compliance-reports.description: Create reports for audit and regulatory requirements
steps: Select report type (Audit Trail, SLA Compliance, Data Access)
reportTypes: Audit Trail - All system changes with user attribution
SLA Compliance - Deadline adherence by case/client
Access Log - Who accessed what data and when
Document History - Version and access history per document
compliance-reports.securityNote: Compliance reports may contain sensitive data - handle with appropriate care

commonMistakes.impact: Slow performance, excessive data, browser crashes
commonMistakes.prevention: Always set reasonable date ranges, use pagination for large datasets
Double-check recipient list, use role-based distribution lists
Note 'Last Updated' timestamp, manually refresh when needed

commonMistakes.mistake: Creating too many custom reports with overlapping data
commonMistakes.impact: Confusion about which report to use, maintenance overhead
commonMistakes.prevention: Standardize on key reports, retire duplicates

staff.focus: Personal productivity reports, assigned case reports
staff.permissions: Limited to own data and team-shared reports
staff.tips: Use task completion reports for daily planning

manager.focus: Team performance, SLA monitoring, client portfolio
manager.permissions: Full team data, can create and schedule reports
manager.tips: Schedule weekly performance reports for team reviews

partner.tips: Use dashboard widgets for real-time visibility

admin.focus: System reports, audit trails, data integrity
admin.permissions: All reports including system and compliance
admin.tips: Run monthly data quality reports, monitor audit logs

faqs.question: Why is my report taking so long to generate?
faqs.answer: Large date ranges or complex filters slow reports. Try narrowing the date range, reducing columns, or exporting to Excel for large datasets.

faqs.question: Can I share a report with external parties?
faqs.answer: Export to PDF and share the file. Do not share report links as they require system login.

faqs.question: How do I edit a scheduled report?
faqs.answer: Go to Reports > Scheduled, find the report, click Edit to modify schedule, recipients, or filters.
